title: Deception
description: School's back in session at the Hive Academy and Gizmo, Jinx and Mammoth are up to something. To find out what, the Titans send Cyborg on a daring undercover mission to infiltrate the academy and blend in as one of their own. Using a holographic cloaking device, Cyborg creates the appearance he is fully human and takes on the persona of Stone, a tough transfer student who can change into a powerful creature of Solid Rock. But when the Academy's mysterious new headmaster, Brother Blood, takes an interest in Stone, will Cyborg's cover be blown?
